text.value: FROM THE FARM FIELDS, BOUNDARIES, FALLOW LANDS OWNED BY NEIGHBORS
Inadequate household food stocks due to lack of farm inputs
Inadequate household food stocks due to small land size
INADEQUATE HOUSEHOLD FOOD STOCKS DUE TO CROP PEST DAMAGE
Not able to reach the market due to high transportation costs
Food in the market was very expensive
OBTAINED BY EXCHANGE FOR OTHER ITEMS (BUT NOT PURCHASED)
WASTE FROM NON-FARM WORK (e.g. CARPENTRY,BUILING, etc.)
FROM THE FARM FIELDS, BOUNDARIES, FALLOW LANDS OWNED/OPERATED BY THE HOUSEHOLD
Seeds and products from nuts/seeds (excl. cooking oil)
LETTER OR ALLOCATION FROM VILLAGE GOV'T
OFFER OF THE RIGHT OF OCCUPANCY
Milk products (like cream, cheese, yoghurt etc)
INADEQUATE HOUSEHOLD STOCKS DUE TO DROUGHT/POOR RAINS

bind.jr:constraintMsg: For Question 12: You must enter a a value between 0 and 168
For Question 15: You must enter a a value between 0 and 168
For Question 14: You must enter a a value between 0 and 5
For Question 13: You must enter a a value between 0 and 12

Restrict consumption by adults for small children to eat?
Borrow food, or rely on help from a friend or relative?
Have no food of any kind in your house-hold?
Go a whole day and night without eating anything?
